      Adds a new item to the database if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - the database connection used to execute the SQL queries
      item - the item to be added to the database
      Returns:
      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing the result of the operation and a message

    • FetchItemsListInfo

      public ServerResponseDataContainer FetchItemsListInfo(Connection dbConn, int supplierID)
      Fetches a list of items for a specific supplier from the database.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - the database connection used to execute the SQL query
      supplierID - the ID of the supplier whose items are to be fetched
      Returns:
      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing a map of item names to categories and a response message

    • FetchFullItemsListInfo

      public ServerResponseDataContainer FetchFullItemsListInfo(Connection dbConn, int supplierID)
      Fetches a detailed list of items for a specific supplier from the database.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - the database connection used to execute the SQL query
      supplierID - the ID of the supplier whose items are to be fetched
      Returns:
      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing a map of item names to Item instances and a response message

    • RemoveItemInfo

      public ServerResponseDataContainer RemoveItemInfo(Connection dbConn, Map<String,Integer> itemData)
      Removes an item from the database based on its name and supplier ID.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - the database connection used to execute the SQL query
      itemData - a map containing the item name and supplier ID of the item to be deleted
      Returns:
      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing the result of the operation and a message

    • UpdateItemInfo

      public ServerResponseDataContainer UpdateItemInfo(Connection dbConn, Item item)

      Parameters:
      dbConn - the database connection used to execute the SQL query
      item - the Item instance containing the updated information

      a ServerResponseDataContainer containing the result of the operation and a message
